title: OT17: Their Hand Is At Your Threads, Yet Ye See Them Not
summary:
Key ideas:
- The importance of structure in achieving productivity and success
- How deviating from structure can lead to wasting time and losing focus

Key learnings:
- Setting a schedule and sticking to it increases productivity
- Breaking tasks into smaller components and completing them one at a time can help maintain focus

Key questions:
- How can I maintain structure in my daily life?
- What are the consequences of not following a structured routine?
